task.title: DITA_Task_Example
task.shortdesc: This is an example of a DITA task topic

taskbody.context:
This outlines the steps in an example task
You will need to follow these steps to create a task

step.cmd: In Oxygen XM, select File > New
Select the task topic from the Framwork Template folder.
Follow the file path to the folder where you will save this task topic
